Heading: Raised by
Value: Both parents until 15 when put into a boys home

Heading: Age of family event
Value: No real family event. He thought he witnessed his younger brother being killed, but it turns out he was never there to witness it.

Heading: Problems in school?
Value: Could not focus and could not sit still, schoolwork was poor, dropped out of second year high school at age 14

Heading: Sexually abused?
Value: He was not sexually abused until he went to the boys’ home. Where he was sodomized by all the other 'inmates'

Heading: Father’s occupation
Value: WWII veteran of Scottish heritage, worked for the Forestry Department

Heading: Age of first sexual experience
Value: First sexual experience was in boys home with the inmates; he was sodomized and also sodomized the younger boys

Heading: Grades in school
Value: N/A – Fraser had a hard time focusing

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Types of jobs worked
Value: Odd jobs such as mowing lawns and driving children to school for petrol and beer money.

Heading: Employment status during series
Value: He was working on and off again 'odd' jobs.

Heading: Number of children
Value: Father to one child, step father to another

Heading: Lives with his children
Value: Lived with his children until jail.

Heading: Living with
Value: Bought a 2-bedroom flat with fiancé and stepson (then had daughter), moved in with many 'girlfriends'

Heading: Abused drugs?
Value: Yes, involved in the prison drug ring

Heading: Committed previous crimes?
Value: Aggregated assault, illegal drug use, theft,

Heading: Killed prior to series? Age?
Value: Says he had killed before series. Can also include the death of Keyra as prior to series killing. Keyra was killed when Leonard was 47 years old.

Heading: Victim type
Value: Child, young women, strangers, people who are alone

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Date of first kill in series
Date of final kill in series
Method of killing
Value: Stab wounds, strangulation, blow to the head

Heading: Location of first contact
Value: Raped a tourist in Sydney's Botanical Gardens

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Victim abducted or killed at contact?
Value: Some were abducted, some were killed at first opportunity to strike

Heading: Robbed victim or location
Value: Not during his serial killing, did rob once during rape

Heading: Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Name and state of prison
Value: Wolston Correctional Center at Wacol in Brisbane

Heading: References

column4: P.B. The Bad Seed The Leonard Fraser Story. October 2
